Description:
A magnetic bottle containing a quantity of plasma within its field.  When propelled at an enemy ship by a coilgun it shatters on impact, melting large swathes of armor away.

Type: Ballistic/Magnetic
Size: 400mm Ampoule
Role: Offensive
Armor Penetration: 45 cm
Component Damage: 60 hp
Penetration Depth: 0 m
Muzzle Velocity: 600 m/s
Range: 12,000 m
Volume: 0.8 mÂ³
